name: Sandcourier
description:
Sandcourier is a project developed by our students during the 2021/22 academic year for TBO project in collaboration with 34BigThings.

A downloadable game for Windows.

In a post-apocalyptic Earth, you are a survivor trying to reach the last place where you don't have to fight to survive: Eden City. Drive your itinerant shop through the Badlands, interact with the remaining survivors and help them to increase your chances to face the obstacles in your way. Endure the harsh conditions of a land that has nothing to offer in this third-person story-driven adventure. 

Controls: Keyboard and mouse 

W/A/S/D: movement 
Q/E: thrust left/right
SHIFT: turbo
SPACE: pick up items/interaction
MOUSE: camera movement
I: inventory
ESC: pause menu

Gamepad:
R2: acceleration
L2: brake
R1 L1: thrust left/right
O: turbo
X: pick up items/interaction
Left stick: movement
Right stick: camera movement
Select: Inventory
Start: Pause manu
